title: What are the results from photosynthesis? - Quora

response.answer_text: Photosynthesis is a process by which plants, algae, and certain microorganisms transform light energy from the sun into the chemical energy of food. Duringphotosynthesis, energy from sunlight is harnessed and used to convert carbon dioxide and water into organic compounds-namely sugar molecules-and oxygen. These are the benefits of Photosynthesis and its results .
